channel.title: Drizzt's AutoMageTrain
channel.description:
this Script will train your mage.
all you have to do is fill in the player array, specify your type of training, and press play!
post progress reports here please
I have my newest one ready, but it's on my other computer, i'll add autocoloring and then i'll add it, but then it may be added to the script sales forum, idk though

item.title: Drizzt's AutoMageTrain

item.description:

Yeah do that,all those scripts with that rule.You see those past ones made my solem_wishes and Summilion and Lorax;most of theirs use auto-color.
